questions.question_text:
You plan to deploy a Power BI Premium tenant.

You need to specify the capacity of the tenant.

Which unit should you use?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Correct answer is v-cores.
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/power-bi/enterprise/service-admin-premium-manage

questions.question_text:
Note: This question is part of a series of questions that present the same scenario. Each question in the series contains a unique solution that might meet the stated goals. Some question sets might have more than one correct solution, while others might not have a correct solution.

After you answer a question in this section, you will NOT be able to return to it. As a result, these questions will not appear in the review screen.

You have a Power Query query in a Power BI report. The query maps source database columns to the input columns of a time series machine learning model.

You discover that the model fails to process a source time field.

You need to ensure that the model processes the field.

Solution: You convert the time column into the Text data type.

Does this meet the requirement?

You have an Azure Synapse Analytics dedicated SQL pool.
You need to ensure that the SQL pool is scanned by Azure Purview.
What should you do first?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
I took the exam a few days ago (14/8/2023) and I passed the exam with a score of 915.
My answer was "Register a data source."

Selected Answer: D
D is correct answer.

questions.question_text:
You have an Azure Synapse Analytics workspace that is connected to a data lake.

You train an Open Neural Network Exchange (ONNX) model named Model1.

You need to implement Model1.

What should you do first?

choices.C: Load Model1 into a character variable.
choices.B: Load Model1 into a binary variable.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
I believe the ONNX model should be loaded before it is scored (using PREDICT). They are binary so should be stored in a binary variable.
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/synapse-analytics/sql-data-warehouse/sql-data-warehouse-predict

Selected Answer: D
Parquet is correct answer. Refer to Question Number # 69.

questions.question_text:
You have an Azure subscription that contains an Azure Synapse Analytics serverless SQL pool named Pool1.

You plan to deploy a data lake that will record the history of transactions executed against Pool1.

You need to recommend which type of file to use to store the history. The solution must ensure that the history is written in the scope of the related transaction.

Which file type should you recommend?
